description: Specialty plan of care notes information.

columns.name: POC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SPOC_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note for the plan of care.

columns.name: SPOC_NOTE_CSN
columns.description: This item contains a link to a note contact. The note contact can be used to determine what the note contained in a particular version.

columns.name: SPOC_NOTE_PURPOSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The purpose category ID for the plan of care. The purpose is used to classify the note and match it to the section which contains its definitions.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Physician's Assessment


Nurse's Assessment


Dietitian's Assessment


Social Worker's Assessment


Therapist's Assessment


Certification Statement


Rehab Potential and Discharge Plans


Advance Care Planning


IDG Assessment


Patient Understanding


Plan Assessment


Clergy's Assessment


Bereavement


IDG Orders


Hospice Non-Covered Items, Drugs, and Services


Cutover Assessment
